mapper.select: SELECT s.seat_id, s.seat_restaurant_id, s.seat_type, s.seat_max_people FROM seat s WHERE s.seat_restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} AND s.seat_max_people >= #{peopleCount} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM reservation rs WHERE rs.reservation_seat = s.seat_id AND rs.reservation_status = '예약완료' AND TO_CHAR(rs.reservation_time, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI') = #{slotTime} ) AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM slot_lock sl WHERE sl.seat_id = s.seat_id AND sl.slot_expired_at > SYSTIMESTAMP )
